20101223073907.000|20101223073907.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 0:31:00
20101223073906.000|20101223073908.000|CC1|HAVE HEAT WAVES, INTENSE

20101223074013.000|20101223074014.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHAT IS YOUR

20101223074116.000|20101223074116.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 0:31:00
20101223074115.000|20101223074118.000|CC1|>> THERE'S NO QUESTION THAT     
20101223074118.000|20101223074120.000|CC1|GOING BACK ALMOST 20 YEARS THAT 
20101223074120.000|20101223074122.000|CC1|CERTAIN SEGMENTS OF INDUSTRY GOT

20101223074202.000|20101223074204.000|CC1|THERE ARE SO MANY SCIENTISTS WHO
20101223074204.000|20101223074205.000|CC1|DISAGREE WITH WHAT YOU'RE       
20101223074205.000|20101223074208.000|CC1|SAYING, NASA, NOAA, THE NATIONAL
